original_text:
For, because you trusted in your works and your treasures,
    you also shall be taken;
and Chemosh shall go into exile
    with his priests and his officials.
korean_text: 네가 네 업적과 보물을 의뢰하므로 너도 정복을 당할 것이요 그모스는 그의 제사장들과 고관들과 함께 포로되어 갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: For, because you trusted in your works
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네가 네 행위를 의지하였기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and Chemosh shall go into exile
with his priests and his officials
